cards.name: Marsupial Rat
cards.description: Search the discard pile for any card and draw it.

cards.name: Albino Rat
cards.description: No effect.

cards.name: Gnoll Scout
cards.description: No effect.

cards.name: Earthroot
cards.description: Until the start of your next turn, card effects are disabled.

cards.name: Sungrass
cards.description: After you take damage, you may discard this card instantly.

cards.name: Potion of Paralytic Gas
cards.description: Reveal: Your card effects are disabled. Concealed: Give this card to another player and reveal it.

cards.name: Potion of Healing
cards.description: If you have 6 or more cards in your hand, discard 3 cards.

cards.name: Scroll of Identify
cards.description: Reveal a card in your opponent's hand. If it's not a potion, scroll or a wand, repeat.

cards.name: Scroll of Wipe Out
cards.description: Discard your hand and draw the same amount of cards.

cards.name: Sad Ghost
cards.description: Draw a card. Quest: Discard a rat, a gnoll or a crab. Reward: Banish a revealed card, or a card from the discard pile.

cards.name: Talisman of Foresight
cards.description: Reveal: The top card of drawing pile is always visible.

cards.name: Unstable Spellbook
cards.description: Reveal: Your scrolls can be played in any location.

cards.name: Wand of Magic Missile
cards.description: Zap: Deal 2 damage. Magic Shield: Reflect +2.

cards.name: Wand of Blast Wave
cards.description: Zap: Deal 1 damage. Magic Shield: Reflect +3

cards.name: Gnoll Trickster
cards.description: Conceal a card.

cards.name: Sewer Crab
cards.description: Force your opponent to choose one: Take 4 damage / Conceal a revealed wand.

cards.name: Great Crab
cards.description: Magic Shield: Reflect

cards.name: Goo
cards.description: Locked Floor: Boss.

cards.name: Dew Vial
cards.description: Search the discard pile for an Ankh. You may draw it.

cards.name: Well of Transmutation
cards.description: Can be played on any card. Choose this card's location.

cards.name: Crazy Thief
cards.description: Steal a card.

cards.name: Skeleton
cards.description: Charge: Deal 1 damage, Take 1 damage.

cards.name: Rotberry
cards.description: Can be played in any location, excluding Sewers. This card cannot be played if it's the last card before you win.

cards.name: Swiftthistle
cards.description: Until the end of your next turn, players cannot play their last cards.

cards.name: Potion of Strength
cards.description: Reveal: This card's power in duels equals 11.

cards.name: Potion of Haste
cards.description: Take another turn. You may not end the game in it.

cards.name: Scroll of Remove Curse
cards.description: Discard a card. If it was cursed, repeat. Otherwise, draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Scroll of Banishment
cards.description: Choose a card from the discard pile and banish it.

cards.name: Old Wandmaker
cards.description: Quest: Discard a Rotberry, Corpse Dust, or a Fire Elemental. Reward: Draw a wand from the discard pile.

cards.name: Alchemist's Toolkit
cards.description: You may choose one: Discard 3 seeds and scavenge a potion / Discard 7 seeds and win the game.

cards.name: Sandals of Nature
cards.description: Search the discard pile for a seed and draw it. You may give it to another player.

cards.name: Wand of Lightning
cards.description: Zap: Deal 2 damage. Magic shield: All other players take 1 damage.

cards.name: Wand of Regrowth
cards.description: Scavenge a seed and put it in deck. Shuffle it afterwards. Magic Shield: Take 1 damage.

cards.name: Gnoll Shaman
cards.description: Concealed: Deal 1 damage. Charge: Zap: Deal 2 damage.

cards.name: Prison Guard
cards.description: Unless played on an enemy, steal 3 cards and discard them.

cards.name: Crazy Bandit
cards.description: Steal a card. Give it's former owner a card of your choice.

cards.name: Tengu
cards.description: Locked Floor: Boss.

cards.name: Corpse Dust
cards.description: Discard 6 minions

cards.name: Ankh
cards.description: Reveal: Discard this card to keep playing if you lose to another card or effect.

cards.name: Vampire Bat
cards.description: Reveal: At the end of your turn, conceal this card.

cards.name: Fadeleaf
cards.description: Discard a card. If it's an enemy, move it to the top of drawing pile instead.

cards.name: Icecap
cards.description: Conceal an opponent's card of your choice.

cards.name: Potion of Invisibility
cards.description: Conceal all of your cards.

cards.name: Potion of Frost
cards.description: Force an opponent to conceal all their cards.

cards.name: Scroll of Upgrade
cards.description: Reveal: The damage of your zaps is increased by 1.

cards.name: Scroll of Magic Mapping
cards.description: Look at the top card of drawing pile. You may draw it.

cards.name: Blacksmith
cards.description: Quest: Discard Pickaxe. Reward: Choose this card's location.

cards.name: Horn of Plenty
cards.description: Reveal: draw one card each turn (is this bad?)

cards.name: Cloak of Shadows
cards.description: Reveal: At the beginning of your turn, you may conceal a card.

cards.name: Wand of Avalanche
cards.description: Zap: Deal 2 damage. Magic Shield: Deal 3 damage.

cards.name: Wand of Frost
cards.description: Zap: Deal 2 damage. Magic Shield: Reflect -2

cards.name: Cave Spinner
cards.description: Can be instantly played on any 3 cards of the same type.

cards.name: Gnoll Brute
cards.description: Reveal: Block up to 2 damage from lost duels.

cards.name: Shielded Brute
cards.description: Reveal: Block up to 4 damage from lost duels.

cards.name: DM-300
cards.description: Locked floor: Boss.

cards.name: Skeleton Key
cards.description: Can bypass and be played on any Locked floor.

cards.name: Fire Elemental
cards.description: Duel: Deal 3 damage.

cards.name: Dwarf Monk
cards.description: Choose one: Duel: Deal 2 damage. / Duel: Discard a card.

cards.name: Firebloom
cards.description: If placed on a seed, deal 3 damage. Can be instantly played on Goo and counter it.

cards.name: Stormvine
cards.description: Reverse turn order.

cards.name: Potion of Liquid Flame
cards.description: Deal 1 damage. Target's turn is uninterrupted. Reveal: Instantly discard this card and take 2 damage.

cards.name: Potion of Levitation
cards.description: Choose one: Reverse turn order / Choose this card's location. Skip 1 turn.

cards.name: Scroll of Rage
cards.description: No effect.

cards.name: Scroll of Antimagic
cards.description: Magic shield: Nullify. Can be played on any card with Zap.

cards.name: Ambitious Imp
cards.description: Quest: Reveal a cursed card. Reward: Give it to an opponent.

cards.name: Chalice of Blood
cards.description: Charge: Take 2 damage. Discard any 2 cards.

cards.name: Cape of Thorns
cards.description: Reveal: Nullify all damage. Do not draw any cards. If you are forced to draw a card, end your turn prematurely.

cards.name: Wand of Fireblast
cards.description: Zap: Deal 2 damage. Magic Shield: Reflect +3.

cards.name: Wand of Corruption
cards.description: If you win a duel with this card, steal the opponent's card.

cards.name: Dwarf Warlock
cards.description: Charge: Zap: Deal 5 damage. Concealed: Duel: Deal 4 damage.

cards.name: Golem
cards.description: Cards with power lower than 9 can't be played on this card.

cards.name: Senior Monk
cards.description: Force the player with most cards in his hand to discard cards until he has 5 cards left.

cards.name: Dwarf King
cards.description: Locked Floor: Boss.

cards.name: Scroll Holder
cards.description: All players may discard their scrolls.

cards.name: Dwarf Token
cards.description: Charge: All players may discard all dwarf related cards.

cards.name: God's Larva
cards.description: When Yog-Dzewa is played, you may instantly discard this card.

cards.name: Succubus
cards.description: Duel: Swap your hands with an opponent. Losing the duel cancels this effect.

cards.name: Sorrowmoss
cards.description: No effect. should have same but weaker effect of toxgas

cards.name: Starflower
cards.description: Shuffle the deck.

cards.name: Potion of Toxic Gas
cards.description: No effect.

cards.name: Potion of Experience
cards.description: Draw a card. You may return it to the deck and shuffle it.

cards.name: Scroll of Teleportation
cards.description: Choose this card's location.

cards.name: Ethereal Chains
cards.description: Steal a card.

cards.name: Dried Rose
cards.description: This card can be used as any card for any quest.

cards.name: Wand of Disintegration
cards.description: Zap: Deal 2 damage. Magic Shield: Reflect +2

cards.name: Wand of Prismatic Light
cards.description: Zap: Deal 2 damage. Magic Shield: Reflect +2

cards.name: Evil Eye
cards.description: Charge: Banish a revealed card.

cards.name: Scorpio
cards.description: Deal 1 damage. Target's turn is uninterrupted.

cards.name: Acidic Scorpio
cards.description: Deal 1 damage.

cards.name: Rotting Fist
cards.description: When Yog-Dzewa is played, you may instantly discard this card. Can be played on Ranged Enemies.

cards.name: Burning Fist
cards.description: When Yog-Dzewa is played, you may instantly discard this card. Can be played on Elite Enemies.

cards.name: Yog-Dzewa
cards.description: Locked Floor: Boss.

cards.name: Amulet of Yendor
cards.description: Move this card to the bottom of deck. If played again, win the game.
